body:
This function is inside `tensorflow.contrib.layers.python.layers`.

You should run:
```
from tensorflow.contrib.layers.python.layers import encoders
encoders.bow_encoder
```

These kind of questions are better addressed at [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow), the GitHub is used for bug reporting mainly. And when bug reporting, please follow guidelines for your post — filling all the required fields when opening a new Issue.
